EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Western Union CN Workshop_NJ_Q416.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Confirmed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/montvale]]> Thank you for registering for the upcoming Cloud Native Workshop in Montvale. See event details below:
Date: October 14, 2016 Time: 9:00 AM - 12:00 PM Location: Western Union, 100 Summit Ave, Montvale, NJ 07645
{{my.Save the Date}}
Questions? Please email Joe Sagrati at jsagrati@pivotal.io <[[mailto:jsagrati@pivotal.io]]>.
